backend/main.mo: Motoko canister handling access control, user profiles, deposit intents, and deposit submissions with authorization checks.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing features, involved files, components, tests, and confidence levels for recent fixes.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup defining theme variables for light and dark modes and global base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry file mounting the app root and loading the main React script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app routing configuration with public, auth, user, and admin routes wrapped in theming and global layout providers.
frontend/src/components/AppErrorBoundary: React error boundary that catches runtime errors and displays a fallback screen.
frontend/src/components/layouts/AdminDas: Admin dashboard layout with sidebar, header, and routed main content.
frontend/src/components/layouts/PublicLa: Public-facing layout with header, footer, routed content, and an alert for auth initialization errors.
frontend/src/components/layouts/UserDash: User dashboard layout containing sidebar, header, and routed main content.
frontend/src/components/nav/AdminSidebar: Renders the admin sidebar with navigation links for dashboard, deposits, users, announcements, and settings.
frontend/src/components/nav/DashboardHea: Provides a header with a sidebar trigger and logout button that clears identity and query cache.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicFooter: Displays a public footer with copyright text and a Caffeine.ai referral link.
frontend/src/components/nav/PublicHeader: Renders the public site header with navigation, branding, and a responsive mobile menu.
Renders the user sidebar with navigation for dashboard, tokens, and referral sections.
frontend/src/components/screens/AccessDe: Shows an access denied message with options to navigate to login or home.
frontend/src/components/screens/AppError: Displays a generic application error screen with a reload button.
frontend/src/components/screens/InitErro: Shows an initialization error message with a button to reload the page.
frontend/src/components/screens/StartupS: Displays either a loading screen for startup or an error screen with reload option.
frontend/src/components/StartupGate.tsx: Startup wrapper showing a loading or error screen until minimal initialization completes.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user’s identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication and state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, presale data, deposits, and admin data via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useSession.ts: Combines identity, actor, and React Query to fetch the current user's profile and role and expose session state.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind base layers and custom CSS variables for theming, including VCoin colors and layout defaults.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider and renders the root component.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminHome.tsx: Displays admin dashboard metrics and placeholder presale stage info using cards.
frontend/src/pages/admin/AdminSettings.t: Shows admin settings sections with placeholders for presale, wallet, and vesting configuration.
frontend/src/pages/admin/Announcements.t: Provides an admin view for announcements with a placeholder indicating no announcements exist.
frontend/src/pages/admin/DepositsQueue.t: Displays the pending deposits queue with a placeholder when none are available.
frontend/src/pages/admin/UsersManagement: Fetches and displays all users in a table, with loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Login.tsx: Handles Internet Identity login and redirects authenticated users to either admin or user dashboards.
frontend/src/pages/auth/Register.tsx: Guides users through authentication and profile creation, saving the profile and navigating to the user dashboard.
frontend/src/pages/NotFound.tsx: Renders a styled 404 page with a button linking back to the home route.
frontend/src/pages/public/Home.tsx: Landing page with hero banner, feature cards, and presale call‑to‑action sections.
frontend/src/pages/public/Roadmap.tsx: Displays VCoin’s roadmap from 2025–2030 with yearly milestone cards.
frontend/src/pages/public/SmartContractA: Outlines planned smart contract components and explains current off‑chain presale operations.
frontend/src/pages/public/Whitepaper.tsx: Shows structured whitepaper sections including project intro, tokenomics, vision, and referral model.
frontend/src/pages/user/BuyVCoin.tsx: Purchase flow for calculating VCN costs, creating deposit intents, and copying the payment wallet address.
frontend/src/pages/user/DepositHistory.t: Lists parsed user deposit submissions with status, amounts, and optional rejection reasons.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralEarnings: Displays the user's referral code, allows copying the code or link, shows referral reward structure, and shows total earnings.
frontend/src/pages/user/ReferralNetworkT: Provides a referral network overview with an alert explaining the structure and a placeholder card when no referrals exist.
frontend/src/pages/user/TokenBalance.tsx: Shows total, locked, and unlocked VCN token balances with an alert explaining presale token lock rules.
frontend/src/pages/user/UserHome.tsx: User dashboard offering shortcuts to buying tokens, viewing balances, and accessing referral features, plus a quick referral code copy section.
Displays vesting information and whether vesting has begun, with pre-launch and post-launch states.
frontend/src/routes/routeGuards.tsx: Implements UserGuard and AdminGuard components handling authentication, initialization states, redirects, and admin password-change enforcement.
frontend/src/utils/assetUrl.ts: Builds safe asset URLs respecting development and production base paths.
frontend/src/utils/fingerprint.ts: Generates and stores a short browser fingerprint using device and environment attributes.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL parameters, persisting them in sessionStorage, and managing hash-based parameter handling.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color tokens, container settings, extended animations, and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, requirements, issues, and architectural notes for a Web2-style VCoin dashboard with manual presale management and no blockchain or OTP features.
